ygData.subject: Re: CE: Solders and Elves
ygData.msgSnippet: soldiers rock, and always will in my opinion. i HAVE to doubt that thieves can do more damage. especially at the higher levels. bombs are good and all, but my

soldiers rock, and always will in my opinion. i HAVE to doubt that 
thieves can do more damage. especially at the higher levels. bombs 
are good and all, but my experience was you have to get the enemy to 
walk fairly close to them, and if they did that it was more than 
likely they could stomp you. but to the question at hand.

elves aren't perfect to me because of the similarities of their 
attacks. not to mention they are slow as molasses. they seem to be 
hardy little buggers though, so they got that goin for em. and the 
problem with them is that if they hide out in a big enough forest, 
they can be outside the range of normal attacks (save whirlwind), 
even explosions. heartburst conceivably still reaches them, but they 
do have that avenue of escape that could be annoying. they can also 
attack with no problem through the forest. why does this not 
unbalance them? not every stage has a forest. then you really wail on 
the suckers.

-Oldschool
